verbose_text: In the simple mathematical model described above, d = 0 represents complete Dll1 deficiency (no Notch signalling), and d x = I 1 (x)/[P+ I 1 (x) + I 2 + N] when there is ' x ' fraction of I 1 than in wild-type embryos, an estimation of the Dll1 level triggering Notch signalling in P; for instance, x in Dll1 heterozygous embryos might equal 1/2.
